pageTitle: Last payment amount from pension or annuity - %s

amount.label: How much was your last %s pension payment?

errors.required: Enter the amount of your last pension payment
errors.notNum: Pension amount must only include numbers
errors.badFormat: Enter the amount in the right format, like 85 or 85.50

heading: How much was your last %s pension payment?

errors.notNum: Amount before deductions must only include numbers
errors.badFormat: Enter the amount before deductions in the right format, like 85 or 85.50

errors.notNum: Amount after deductions must only include numbers
errors.badFormat: Enter the amount after deductions in the right format, like 85 or 85.50
errors.notLessThan: Amount after deductions must be less than the amount before deductions
